address:
100 Chopin Plaza
Miami, Florida 33131, United States
description:
An iconic fixture on the downtown Miami skyline for 40 years, InterContinental Miami boasts a waterfront location on Biscayne Bay, steps away from arts & entertainment in Miami’s Brickell neighborhood. A beacon for both business and leisure travelers, the hotel rises 34 stories over the city with breathtaking views of the Atlantic Ocean, Biscayne Bay and the Port of Miami. Recently completed a $40 million renovation the hotel offers 652 rooms & suites with a Club InterContinental lounge.

address:
145 SW 11th Street
Miami, Florida 33130, United States
description:
Welcome to Hotel Indigo® Miami Brickell, a 4-star boutique hotel in the entertainment center of Miami. Set in the heart of Brickell, we’re steps from rooftop bars, luxury shops, and late-night restaurants at Brickell City Centre.
This is where locals gather and visitors become regulars. With the free Metromover just outside, you’re minutes from the Kaseya Center, Bayside Marketplace, and the Arsht Center. South Beach? It’s a quick hop on the Metrorail, no car needed.
Whether you’re here for a cruise, a business trip, or a weekend away for a girls or guys trip to Miami, our hotel near the Port of Miami puts you close to it all. Cool off in the outdoor pool, unwind at Mosaico Kitchen + Bar, or take care of business with flexible meeting space and high-speed Wi-Fi. Our Three Diamond-rated hotel offers valet parking, plush guest rooms, and a team that knows Brickell like the back of their hand. Stay with us and experience Miami through a stay that’s stylish, comfortable, and rooted in the neighborhood.
Read less

address:
145 SW 11th Street
Miami, Florida 33130, United States
description:
Nestled in the chic Brickell neighborhood near Port of Miami, Atwell Suites Miami Brickell is a 4-star hotel offering an unparalleled experience, close to beautiful beaches & top attractions. Discover trendy rooftop restaurants & bars. Shop upscale boutiques in Brickell City Centre. Enjoy live music at Bayside Marketplace on Biscayne Bay & soak up the sun at Miami's iconic South Beach. We share a building with Hotel Indigo Miami Brickell so when you stay, you can also enjoy their restaurant & bar, and shared premium amenities without the fees like the rooftop pool, fitness center, and meeting spaces.
Visit the Perez Art Museum, explore the vibrant culture of Little Havana, or catch an exciting Miami Marlins game at LoanDepot Park. We also proudly welcome all AAA & CAA members to stay with us at our Three Diamond-rated hotel & explore all Miami has to offer. Balance work & play in our spacious, pet-friendly suites that all have standing desks and walk-out balconies. Collaborate in our shared workspaces & bookable boardroom, The Study, with panoramic views. Satiate anytime cravings at our 24/7 Market & Beverage Station, and enjoy our paid bar with cocktails & shareable small plates. For an authentic taste of Miami, dine at Mosaico Kitchen & Bar located in our shared space with Hotel Indigo. From free breakfast to rooftop pool & fitness studio, indulge in the perfect blend of comfort & convenience at Atwell Suites Miami Brickell, where your Miami adventure awaits!
Read less

address:
3499 N.W. 25th Street
Miami, Florida 33142, United States
description:
Welcome to EVEN Hotel Miami – Airport, where comfort meets convenience in the heart of Miami. Our Miami Airport hotel is perfectly positioned near Miami International Airport and PortMiami, making it easy for you to experience the very best of Miami, Florida.
Whether you’re visiting for business or leisure, explore Miami with ease. Explore local favorites such as Hard Rock Stadium, Magic City Casino, and LoanDepot Park. Immerse yourself in world-class shopping at Bayside Marketplace, Brickell City Centre, and Dolphin Mall. Business travelers will appreciate being near Florida International University, Carnival Cruise Line, and Lennar Corporation. At EVEN Hotel Miami – Airport, you’re never far from where you need to be.
Relax in our thoughtfully designed guestrooms, featuring free Wi-Fi, plush bedding, and modern bathrooms. Enjoy a delicious meal at EVEN Kitchen & Bar or pick up snacks and essentials from our 24/7 market. Take advantage of our state-of-the-art fitness center or simply unwind in your comfortable room after a day of adventure. At EVEN Hotel Miami – Airport, we’re dedicated to providing a quality stay with all the modern conveniences you expect. We look forward to welcoming you and making your visit to Miami exceptional!
Read less

Start your day on the beach or take a stroll along Ocean Drive, where you'll find activities for all tastes and ages. Relax by the rooftop pool or on the sun deck, enjoying a cocktail while taking in the views of the famous Collins Avenue, all while we take care of making your stay perfect. The only thing you need to do is relax and immerse yourself in the fun of Miami Beach.

address:
3651 NW 25th Street
Miami, Florida 33142, United States
description:
All-Suite Hotel with Free Shuttle to Miami Airport
The team at Staybridge Suites® Miami International Airport is committed to providing a hospitable experience for your next visit to Miami. You’ll appreciate our convenient location minutes from Miami Airport with free shuttle service to Miami International Airport 7am to 11pm daily. Please call hotel for details at 786 629 1413. Minutes from Miami Car Rental Center serving the airport and downtown Miami, and the new Miami Freedom Park. Soak up the sun at South Beach, experience the hottest clubs in downtown Miami or cheer on your favorite team at the Hard Rock Stadium or Marlins Park. Explore the picturesque Coral Gables or cool down with a visit to the Venetian Pool. University of Miami, Cruise Port Miami, U-Health, Freedom Park (coming soon), University of Miami’s Health Complex are just minutes away from our front door.
After an adventurous day exploring Miami, don’t let the fun stop! Experience a getaway like no other with an outdoor oasis complete with a pool, lounge chairs and fire pit. The highlight of our lobby is the full bar where you can grab a crafted cocktail, temporarily available on select days. Free breakfast buffet is offered daily. Families and extended stay travelers love our spacious suites with fully equipped kitchens, free Wi-Fi, sofa beds and more. Guest laundry and a modern fitness center are always available for free.
Read Less

description:
Welcome to Holiday Inn Miami-International Airport, the perfect choice for travelers seeking comfort, convenience, and a true taste of Miami. Whether you’re here for business, leisure, or a little of both, our hotel near Miami International Airport makes every step of your journey smoother and brighter.
Arriving is easy with our complimentary 24-hour shuttle service to and from Miami International Airport, running every 30 minutes. Planning a cruise? We also offer scheduled transportation to the Port of Miami for a small fee, making us a favorite Cruise Port Hotel in Miami, Florida. From the moment you check in, you’ll discover thoughtful touches that take the stress out of travel.
Business guests will find themselves near major companies and appreciate amenities like free Wi-Fi, a 24-hour Business Center, and 2,427 square feet of flexible meeting space with skyline views. When it’s time to unwind, enjoy our outdoor pool, stay active in the fitness center, or head to the 9th floor to dine at El Mirador Restaurant or sip cocktails at Vista Lounge.
Our central location puts the best of Miami within easy reach. From the sandy shores of South Beach and the colorful murals of Wynwood to the vibrant streets of Little Havana and the energy of Downtown, unforgettable adventures are just minutes away. At Holiday Inn Miami-International Airport, every stay combines relaxation, convenience, and a welcoming spirit that makes you feel right at home.

description:
Miami Beach Oceanfront Hotel with Premium Location
Welcome to the tropically inspired Holiday Inn Miami Beach - Oceanfront hotel, where our 1950's Miami Modern (MiMo) exterior blends seamlessly with vibrant contemporary South Beach style to wrap you in modern comfort. Eleven miles east of Miami International Airport (MIA), our Miami Beach oceanfront hotel is located where I-195 meets A1A at the Atlantic Ocean.
Our oceanfront Miami Beach hotel offers you an unparalleled location, right off Collins Avenue and just two miles from South Beach; home of the best clubs, dining, and shopping. With the Miami Beach beachwalk at your doorstep, take a moonlit stroll on the beach by night, play in the surf by day or simply relax by our large pool overlooking the beach and our lush, tropical garden with its hammock oasis. Be sure to grab a mojito and a delicious meal at our Paradise Café and Blue Parrot Bar.
You will appreciate the close proximity of our hotel to the Miami Beach Convention Center and Lincoln Road shopping, just two miles away. Don’t miss the opportunity to take in the art and culture that make Miami Beach such a popular destination. The Art Deco district, Miami Children’s Museum, Holocaust Memorial, Phillip and Patricia Frost Museum of Science, and the Bass Museum of Art are within a short drive of our hotel. Ask about area transportation via the free Miami Beach Trolley.
Read less

description:
Introducing Candlewood Suites Miami International Airport 36th Street—a haven of comfort and convenience near Miami International Airport. With 130 fully equipped studios featuring kitchens, our hotel offers the perfect blend of functionality and relaxation. And with the vibrant City of Doral a mere 9 minutes away, guests have easy access to dining, shopping, and entertainment options. Whether you're here for business or leisure, our hotel has you covered. Enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi, spacious workstations, and a 24-hour gym to stay connected and fit during your stay. Plus, unwind by the outdoor pool or take advantage of free parking and laundry facilities for added convenience. With major expressways like 826 and 112 nearby, exploring Downtown Miami and Miami Beach is a breeze. From catching a game at Hard Rock Stadium to experiencing the vibrant nightlife, there's something for everyone to enjoy. Welcome to your home away from home at Candlewood Suites Miami International Airport 36th Street—where comfort meets convenience in the heart of Miami.

description:
Hialeah Hotel's Guests Enjoy Sun and Satisfaction
Whether you're working or indulging in a shopping spree at the many nearby world-class shopping destinations, you can enjoy the best of the Miami metro area when you stay at the Holiday Inn Express® Hotel & Suites Miami - Hialeah. This hotel's prime location is eight miles from Miami International Airport and 15 miles from downtown Miami.
If you're visiting for business in Hialeah, the hotel offers free high-speed, wireless Internet access and a 24-hour Business Center to help you keep in touch with colleagues. The Miami Lakes Business District and Medley factories are nearby, and Miami International Airport (MIA) and Opa-Locka Executive Airport (OPF) are within six to eight miles, making long-distance travel a breeze.
The hotel's location in the Miami area provides access to top attractions. Football fans are thrilled by the hotel's proximity to the Hard Rock Stadium, only eight miles away, making our hotel a great choice for visitors in town for the Orange Bowl Game. You can also attend fantastic world-class events, including mesmerizing concerts and sporting events, at the FTX Arena.
After a busy day, you can enjoy an energizing workout in a 24-hour Fitness Center, go for a swim in a beautiful outdoor pool or simply unwind on the peaceful patio. When you stay with us in Hialeah, hotel perks like a free, hot breakfast get each day off to a flawless start!

description: We offer a complimentary shuttle service to and from the Fort Lauderdale-Hollywood International Airport only. The shuttle from the airport to the hotel runs at 2:30pm, 5:30pm, 7:30pm, and 9:30pm. Shuttle service from the hotel to the airport is available at 8am, 11am, and 2pm. If you need cruise transportation, we have several referrals for you that you may choose from.

The Holiday Inn Express & Suites Ft. Lauderdale Airport West is centrally located four miles from the Fort Lauderdale-Hollywood International Airport (FLL) and is less than six miles from the Port Everglades Cruise Port & the Greater Fort Lauderdale/Broward County Convention Center. The campuses of Nova Southeastern University, Broward Community College, Florida International University and Florida Atlantic University are minutes away.Our hotel offers free round trip transportation to the Fort Lauderdale-Hollywood International Airport call hotel for times & availability. For a nominal fee drop off transportation is provided to the Port Everglades cruise terminal. Our convenient location offers easy access to all major highways including I-595, I-95, I-75 and the Florida Turnpike and is minutes from all the excitement downtown Fort Lauderdale offers. Full-service features and amenities include a free full hot breakfast, fitness center and outdoor Pool. This hotel provides spacious guest rooms, refrigerators, microwaves, coffee makers and 32in flat-panel HDTVs.For business travelers, this Davie / Plantation, FL hotel provides modern conveniences like free high-speed Internet access in all suites (wired & wireless), spacious work desks, two-line telephones with voice mail and a business center. The Dolphin Meeting Room can accommodate small meetings.

description:
Florida City Hotel Near the Keys and Miami
Gearing up for a business trip to the Miami area? Planning for a Florida Keys vacation? Choose the accommodations that put you within moments of all that southern Florida has to offer: the Holiday Inn Express® Hotel & Suites Florida City - Gateway to the Keys.
Situated off Route 1 and 9 miles from the Homestead General Aviation Airport, corporate travelers in Florida City appreciate this hotel's proximity to prominent local businesses, including the Turkey Point Nuclear Generating Station. Perks like free wifi throughout the facility ensure productivity during extended business trips, and an on-site boardroom suitable for up to 20 is ideal for meetings with clients and colleagues. Patrons can take a break from the grind, with a round of golf at Keys Gate Golf & Country Club.
While staying in Florida City, hotel guests can spend the day following the nearby Historic Redland Tropical Trail. Stops along the trail include the Everglades Alligator Farm, which offers a thrilling, up-close encounter with Florida wildlife. For fantastic shopping take a day trip to Miami, and for a tropical escape, venture to Key Largo for fun in the sun.
This hotel provides a comfortable, 100% smoke-free environment and all of the amenities you expect, including a sparkling, outdoor pool, a Fitness Center and a complimentary, hot breakfast each day. Our hospitable, attentive staff awaits your arrival. Book a room today!
